data.message: MESSENGER app SUCKKSSSSSS!!! Remove it you ruined facebook mobile

replies.message: Hi Kyle. We're working hard to improve the Messenger experience for everyone. If there's something that we could do to improve your experience, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/XMpTqb. -Chantal
I agree. Requiring a standalone messaging app (whose notifications really can't be turned off for more than 24 hours) seems unnecessary and obnoxious.

I already did delete it now i cant check my messages from my phone any longer which is a inconvenience.. if you want to improve messenger then dont force us to use it!!! No one is happy about being forced to do something I mean look at history

It's incredibly intrusive to request an app to have access to your privacy. Now the fact it's not illegal because your voluntarily requesting it, but extremely unethical. I would recommend you to change the app again, and not request to have access to all of these functions. If not, well Facebook, be prepared to go the way of Myspace.
